long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simpler empowers students to engage with online literacy content at their preferred reading level. Students focus on learning and not deciphering text. This is achieved by simplifying text online using a backend LLM engine.

This Chrome extension is owned by Experimental Systems & Technology Lab, Information Technology Division at the Ministry of Education, Singapore.

This extension is currently on a trial for selected users. If you would like to learn more, you can go to https://simpler.estl.edu.sg/.
